Html:
Even though I have set border styles, setting the above turns off ALL gridlines completely in PDF export mode.
I need to not show gridlines but show the orders I have actually set.

Any ideas??

Hi, I suspect your problem is related to this post

http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=70891

lack of support for borders in the TCPDF frameworks.

-Mark

That is one of the reasons why I dropped PHPExcel for the project I was working on.

I chose to do the output in straight TCPDF. I was able to create borders just fine using TCPDF.

The problem lies in the fact that PHPExcel uses the shortcuts to create HTML and use

TCPDF's HTML->PDF output which is total CRAP.
